#### RIF Regressions

[pyrifreg](https://github.com/vyasenov/pyrifreg) - Recentered Influence Function (RIF) regression analysis following Firpo et al. (2008)

#### Changes-in-Changes

[pycinc](https://github.com/vyasenov/pycinc) - Changes-in-Changes (CiC) model introduced by Athey and Imbens (2006)

#### Lee Bounds

[pyleebounds](https://github.com/vyasenov/pyleebounds) - Treatment effect bounds account for sample selection developed by Lee (2009)

#### Double Post-Lasso
[pydoublelasso](https://github.com/vyasenov/pydoublelasso) - Double-post lasso treatment effect estimation based on Belloni et al. (2014)
